amendment.description: To prohibit the use of funds to implement or enforce Executive Order 14019.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1243 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 45 - 50. Record Vote Number: 279.

action.text: Amendment SA 1243 proposed by Senator Budd to Amendment SA 1092. (consideration: CR S5247) To prohibit the use of funds to implement or enforce Executive Order 14019.
